input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Non-Iron Dress Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Meet your new wardrobe staple. This must have textured solid dress shirt is perfect for any occasion, keeping you looking your absolute best at work and on the weekends. Available in trim fit and standard fit. Need help finding your shirt size? Check out our Shirt Size Guide for the perfect fit.
Collar Style: Semi-spread. A popular collar style that has a wider spread between the collar points to accommodate the widest range of tie knots. Also the best collar type to dress down and wear without a tie.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Semi-Cutaway Collar Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Prince of Wales Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='J. Crew Factory Shirts | Nwt J.Crew Factory Thompson Flex Wrinkle-Free Dress Shirt | Color: White | Size: L | Desertdealsaz's Closet'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Cotton Oxford Stripe Dress Shirt'
  - Name='J. Crew Shirts | J.Crew Slim Tailored Performance Dress Shirt | Color: Blue | Size: 14.5 | Wilkinssheena's Closet'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's All-Day Performance Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim Untucked Flex Shirt'
  - Name='Michael Kors Men's Big & Tall Non-Iron Stretch Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's BeanFlex Twill Long-Sleeve Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Traditional Fit Cotton Oxford Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Regular-Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Slim Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Egara Men's Skinny Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Infinite Slim Fit Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Michael Kors Men's Classic Fit Passport Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Infinite Slim Fit Spread Collar Twill Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Kenneth Cole Men's Regular Fit Non-Iron Checked Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Lands' End Men's Tall No Iron Supima Pinpoint Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Lands' End Men's Tall Pattern No Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Stretch Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Fit Wrinkle-Free Oxford Cloth Button Down Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Women's Relaxed Fit Oxford Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Semi-Cutaway Collar Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a non-iron dress shirt with a semi-cutaway collar, very close to the Tie Bar's semi-spread collar and non-iron feature, indicating high relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Prince of Wales Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a non-iron dress shirt, similar in dress shirt function and non-iron feature, though collar style differs, slightly lowering relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J. Crew Factory Shirts | Nwt J.Crew Factory Thompson Flex Wrinkle-Free Dress Shirt | Color: White | Size: L | Desertdealsaz's Closet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A wrinkle-free dress shirt with flex fabric, relevant as a dress shirt alternative though not explicitly non-iron or same collar style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Cotton Oxford Stripe Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton Oxford dress shirt relevant in shirt type and dress shirt use but no mention of non-iron treatment or collar style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J. Crew Shirts | J.Crew Slim Tailored Performance Dress Shirt | Color: Blue | Size: 14.5 | Wilkinssheena's Closet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance dress shirt, likely with wrinkle resistance and tailored fit, relevant though non-iron status and collar style unclear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's All-Day Performance Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A performance shirt that may have stretch/comfort features; relevant as a dress shirt alternative but less focus on non-iron or collar details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim Untucked Flex Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Designed to be worn untucked, this shirt is more casual and flexible, less relevant to a formal non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Michael Kors Men's Big & Tall Non-Iron Stretch Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron stretch dress shirt extremely relevant, similar function and features, though stretch and size category may differ slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's BeanFlex Twill Long-Sleeve Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a casual twill shirt with stretch features, not specifically a dress shirt or non-iron fabric, reducing relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Traditional Fit Cotton Oxford Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron cotton Oxford dress shirt with traditional fit is very close to the reference in fabric treatment and dress shirt function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Calvin Klein Men's Regular-Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A regular-fit, non-iron dress shirt essentially matches the reference in fabric treatment, fit options, and function â€” highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Calvin Klein Men's Slim Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit non-iron dress shirt aligns perfectly with the reference product's fit and functional attributes.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle-resistant dress shirt is similar though not necessarily non-iron; modern fit is close to reference's fit types.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle-resistant dress shirt is similar though not necessarily non-iron; modern fit is close to reference's fit types.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate product with same attributes and relevancy rationale as previous.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate product with same attributes and relevancy rationale as previous.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate product with same attributes and relevancy rationale as previous.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit spread collar twill dress shirt close in structure and fabric type to reference; highly relevant.
